snippet.title: Out of Your Mind Trailer
snippet.description:
Out of Your Mind
Coming on Steam November 2024

Immerse yourself in a hand-drawn, comic-style visual novel where your choices shape the storyline. Guide Lia through various decisions and emotions that lead to different outcomes. This original story and art present a take on a dystopian world, enhanced by an original soundtrack.

Wishlist on Steam now!:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3141910/Out_of_Your_Mind/?l=english
